scripts.ele:build:es5: ng build ng-custom-elements --base-href /hwservice/ --prod --output-hashing=none && cat dist/ng-custom-elements/runtime-es5.js dist/ng-custom-elements/polyfills-es5.js dist/ng-custom-elements/scripts.js dist/ng-custom-elements/main-es5.js > preview/ng-custom-elements-app-es5.js && cat dist/ng-custom-elements/runtime-es2015.js dist/ng-custom-elements/polyfills-es2015.js dist/ng-custom-elements/scripts.js dist/ng-custom-elements/main-es2015.js > preview/ng-custom-elements-app-es2015.js
scripts.ele:build:es2015: ng build ng-custom-elements --prod --output-hashing=none && cat dist/ng-custom-elements/runtime-es2015.js dist/ng-custom-elements/polyfills-es2015.js dist/ng-custom-elements/scripts.js dist/ng-custom-elements/main-es2015.js > preview/ng-custom-elements-app-es2015.js
